promptVersions.body:
Easily track employee absences, update leave policies, and manage public holidays—all in one place!

• See who is absent and review team leave history

• Adjust and enforce your company’s leave policies

• Add or update public holidays for accurate leave tracking

Want to see how it works?

Watch the demo video: How to Manage HR Leave
promptVersions.description: Prompt for HR to manage absences, leave policies, and holidays, with a demo video link and access to the Leave Administration dashboard.
promptVersions.imageAltText: Screenshot of the HR Leave Administration dashboard showing absences, policies, and holidays
promptVersions.title: Manage Absences, Policies & Holidays
